subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: N.C.A.A. hockey, which has the longest season in college athletics, is “well aware of where we sit on the food chain” when compared with basketball, Quinnipiac’s coach said.
snippet: N.C.A.A. hockey, which has the longest season in college athletics, is “well aware of where we sit on the food chain” when compared with basketball, Quinnipiac’s coach said.
